sqlMap.update: UPDATE TABE_PRED_SUBJECT_FACT fact SET CURRENT_RESULTID = #currentResultid:NUMERIC# WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID != #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND (PRED_SUBJECTID in (select PRED_SUBJECTID from TABE_PRED_SUBJECT_FACT where sessionid = #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC#) OR #currentResultid:NUMERIC# = 1) AND ASSESSMENTID = #assessmentid:NUMERIC# AND test_completion_timestamp = (select max(test_completion_timestamp) from tabe_pred_subject_fact where sessionid != #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC# and pred_subjectid = fact.pred_subjectid and assessmentid = fact.assessmentid and test_completion_timestamp <= decode(#currentResultid:NUMERIC#, 1, sysdate, #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP#))
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TABE_PRED_SUBJECT_FACT WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND PRED_SUBJECTID = #predSubjectid:NUMERIC#
